MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Vanguard Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.54am. Our engineers are on their way to the substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.57am on Monday 11th January 2021.
